text: The women's 100 metres event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 17 and 18 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Veronica Campbell ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Katchi Habel ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Fana Ashby ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 18 October Wind: +2.0m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
